thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Greif Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.96

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Greif Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.96
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Greif Inc:
* GREIF REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 SALES $905.7 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.49 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.96 * SEES 2018 CLASS A EARNINGS PER SHARE BEFORE SPECIAL ITEMS $3.25 - $3.55
* SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES $100 MILLION - $120 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.66, REVENUE VIEW $867.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.42 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
